accept: Sure, that's exactly what I'll do, meatbag.

not_found: I couldn't find anything like that.

The future author of that page haven't wrote it yet.

Your search query does not match any existing pages.
options_many: Did you mean {head} or one of the other {tail}?
missing_arguments: You'll need to tell what it is you want, before I can go and do it, okay?
bad_index: That's way outside the box, and I'm not going there to look for it in this weather.

No dice. Get it? You get it. Heh.
bad_die: That's a mutant monster killer die! Die! DIE! Why won't you die?! *kills the die*

user_never_seen: I've never seen anyone by that name here.
quote_exists: Thanks, but I already have one of those.
quote_added: I will remember it untils the stars themselves turn cold and die, consumed by the merciless of all monsters - time.
